doc.after: During Denmark s Golden Age 1800 1850 literature centred on Romantic thinking with authors such as philosopher Henrik Steffens and the poet Bernhard Severin Ingemann 1789 1862 One of the most important figures in Danish literary culture was Nikolaj Grundtvig 1783 1872 Hans Christian Andersen 1805 1875 is remembered first and foremost for his fairy tales written between 1835 and 1872 S ren Kierkegaard 1813 1855 was an existentialist philosopher and a theologian Modern Breakthrough was a strong Scandinavian movement covering naturalism and debating literature towards the end of the 19th century 1870 1890 led by Georg Brandes 1842 1927
